name: Candyspotting
description:
You owe us money, man. but there is good news: we have plenty of orders. Guess who will carry them? So right now you're going to make stashes out of candies. Your girl will stay with me for the time being. If you decide to escape, I'll smash her head off! Run, rabbit, run!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/$64261
